title: For Sale: T200 Fatima Pittsburgh Pirates team card with Honus Wagner
author: Smokey Joe

posts.post_title: For Sale: T200 Fatima Pittsburgh Pirates team card with Honus Wagner
posts.post_content:
Selling a T200 Fatima Pirates team card with Wagner...SGC says it has been re-colored. But a very nice image.

SOLD delivered and payment any way you choose.

[url]vintagecards@gmail.com[/url]

It's yours for the amount we agreed. PM sent



SOLD
I am bummed I missed out on this card!  Absolutely stunning and one of the cards on my top 10 most wanted list. Congrats to the buyer!
